summary: In Post-Bellum Texas, an army captain tries to keep the peace between overtaxed, impoverished farmers and greedy carpetbaggers.
cast: Randolph Scott|Lex Barker|Phyllis Kirk|Charles McGraw|Henry Hull|Elisha Cook Jr.|Hugh Sanders|Lane Chandler|James Brown|Fess Parker|Mark Dana|Carl Andre|Trevor Bardette|Ralph Bucko|John Cason|Bill Coontz|Steve Darrell|Earle Hodgins|Charles Horvath|Gayle Kellogg|Ethan Laidlaw|Richard Lightner|Cactus Mack|Lou Marcelle|Frank Matts|John McKee|Monte Montague|Jack Montgomery|Boyd 'Red' Morgan|Jack Mower|George Sowards|Brick Sullivan|Charles Sullivan|Glen Walters|Jack Woody
title: La última patrulla
